name: Life Choices
description:
Note 1 : This game is still in development.

Note 2 : This is a fiction work, so this is not based on real-life stories. And take note that this game is psychological-horror game, so anyone with unstable emotion or Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) is advisable to not playing this game.

Main character : Chase Beowulf @ White, aged 24 (actual 21)

Second Main character : Greyson Wolfenski @ Grey, aged 26

Description :

It's about Chase (you), a wolf, with his best friend that he didn't know that Grey loves him, finding and solve the mysteries of a student dead in a burned high school 6 years ago. The school burned and a student died on April 13th (Friday), 2018 and you (Chase Beowulf) was 18 (actual 15) at that time. The school only found you laying in rooftop, unconscious, and no dead body to be found until today ... But actually the real story is not always nice and happy ...

Upcoming update : 

Update is uncertain as this is a hobby project. Both the artist and I are students, so we only can develop this when both of us have the free time.

Version 1.1 - Fix (debug) and publish  Android version (Done and Released !)

Version 1.2 - Fix small font size and style and add more contents (Done and Released !)

Version 1.3 - Add more contents to the game !
